00041     static inline PyObject *import(std::string module, std::string function)
00042     {
00043         auto pModule = PyImport_ImportModule(module.c_str());
00044         assert(pModule);
00045 
00046         auto pFunc = PyObject_GetAttrString(pModule, function.c_str());
00047         assert(pFunc);
00048 
00049         return pFunc;
00050     }

00107     static inline PyObject *convert_string_array(std::string *array, int size)
00108     {
00109         std::string result = array[0];
00110         for (int i = 1; i < size; i++)
00111             result += " " + array[i];
00112         auto pVar = PyString_FromString(result.c_str());
00113         assert(pVar);
00114         return pVar;
00115     }

00119     static inline PyArrayObject *convert_double_2d_array(f_vector_2d_t &v)
00120     {
00121         int dims[2] = {v.size(), v.front().size()};
00122         auto array = new ftype[dims[0] * dims[1]];
00123         int count = 0;
00124         for (const auto &row : v) {
00125             assert(row.size() == dims[1]);
00126             std::copy(row.begin(), row.end(), &array[count]);
00127             count += dims[1];
00128         }
00129         auto pVar = (PyArrayObject *) PyArray_FromDimsAndData(2, dims, NPY_DOUBLE,
00130                     (char *)array);
00131         assert(pVar);
00132         return pVar;
00133     }

00135     static inline PyObject *convert_complex_array(std::complex<double> *array,
00136             int size)
00137     {
00138         auto pList = PyList_New(size);
00139         assert(pList);
00140         for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00141             auto z = array[i];
00142             auto pZ = PyComplex_FromDoubles(z.real(), z.imag());
00143             assert(pZ);
00144             assert(PyList_SetItem(pList, i, pZ) == 0);
00145         }
00146         return pList;
00147     }
00148 
00149     static inline PyObject *convert_dictionary(std::map<std::string, std::string> map)
00150     {
00151         // int dims[1] = {size};
00152         // auto pArray = (PyArrayObject *) PyArray_FromDimsAndData(1, dims, NPY_DOUBLE,
00153         //               reinterpret_cast<char *>(array));
00154         if (map.size() > 0) {
00155             auto pDict = PyDict_New();
00156             assert(pDict);
00157             for (const auto &pair : map) {
00158                 auto pKey = PyString_FromString(pair.first.c_str());
00159                 auto pVal = PyString_FromString(pair.second.c_str());
00160                 assert(PyDict_SetItem(pDict, pKey, pVal) == 0);
00161             }
00162             return pDict;
00163         } else {
00164             return Py_None;
00165         }
00166     }
